text:
Honest review based on my own tatse. Second time i try eat at this resto. Honestly the pho that i try this time not as good as the first time i try.
1. Pho with beef slice, the soup under seasoning, not good flavour as the first time i try. The beef still soft and not dry. The noodle texture ok.Point is 7/10
2. Pho with chicken, omg the chicken meat so dry, tough, and dont taste nice. Im so sorry so dissapointing meal this pho. Point is 5/10
3. Peanut salad‚Ä¶taste fresh and good seasoning. Point is 8/10
4. Vietnam cofffe with milk‚Ä¶taste nice and strong‚Ä¶Must be carefull if u have gastric problem‚Ä¶point is 7,5/10

Excellent dish and Vietnam üáªüá≥ coffee .staff are friendly when I ‚Äòm struggling with DIY system . Everything went smooth with my Changi reward and payment. Just a small suggestion- do add more promotions during weekend . Like coffee ‚òïÔ∏è with small dish - tea break . Keep the crowd moving in ..

One of the restaurants I will have meals before I fly, is fast and good. Not crowded and relaxing. The toilet is so near and has a good cost of meal for less than $20 dollars. The broth bases are good. Try the beef pho.

Nothing really special here. Not so bad if you really miss Vietnamese food. But, don't expect too much. It taste different,,not in a bad way. Maybe because I already experienced too many Vietnamese Restaurant so my expectation little too high

Pho I was served is not what I expected to be. It was served without bean sprouts, culantro nor lime. Soup taste is below average and almost half empty in a big bowl. I wouldn't go back to it. Quite disappointed as I was really looking forward to enjoying the Pho I love. But their lime cold drink was good.
